sys_ui_message.key:
Do you have something Installing?
- Run a DemoHub Sync - Change all the items in an Executing state to Queued. - Check the Progress Workers table. Change the state of long running (several hours) records to complete. - Try all the previous steps in a di
sys_ui_message.message:
Do you have something Installing?
- Run a DemoHub Sync - Change all the items in an Executing state to Queued. - Check the Progress Workers table. Change the state of long running (several hours) records to complete. - Try all the previous steps in a different browser. - Have an SC closer to the region where the instance is located try the same steps in that instance. - If installation takes longer than 24 hrs. and the install queue number stays in the same number **submit a** [**case to HI** ](https://support.servicenow.com/hisp?id=cssp_irp)with the instance details and STR If the HI team does something to the instance, **make a new post to community** *so others can reference that Case when opening their own cases.* [DemoHub Community](https://sc.service-now.com/community?id=community_forum&sys_id=92998102db6c0010eb357aa31f961926) - If the HI team identifies a configuration issue with the instance, create a new post in this community with the proper tag and HI Case Number. This will route the issue to the team that makes the content.
